statements: SELECT id, name, email FROM Employee;
SELECT salary, email FROM Employee ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT name, email, salary FROM Employee WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE salary BETWEEN 50000 AND 80000;
SELECT id, name, email, salary FROM Employee ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT id, name, email FROM Employee WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY id
SELECT name, email, salary FROM Employee WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' AND salary < 70000
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE salary >= 60000 AND encrypted_data IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, email, encrypted_data FROM Employee WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT id, sensitive_info FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, encrypted_info FROM encrypted_data WHERE id > 100;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, sensitive_info FROM sensitive_data WHERE id BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sensitive_info FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, sensitive_info FROM sensitive_data WHERE id IN (3, 4, 5);
SELECT * FROM encrypted_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, encrypted_info FROM encrypted_data WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT name, email FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, email FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT name, email, ssn FROM sensitive_data WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE access_type = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT name, email, ssn FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email, encrypted_data FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE ssn LIKE '123%';
SELECT ssn, name FROM sensitive_data WHERE name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY ssn ASC;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT full_name, email, salary FROM Employee;
SELECT customer_id, address FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_total FROM Order ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY full_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT e.full_name, e.salary, o.order_date FROM Employee e JOIN `Order` o ON e.employee_id = o.customer_id WHERE e.salary < 70000 AND o.order_total > 100 ORDER BY o.order_date ASC;
SELECT p.product_name, p.price, o.order_total FROM Product p JOIN `Order` o ON p.product_id = o.product_id WHERE o.order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY p.price DESC;

SELECT c.full_name AS customer_name, c.address, COUNT(o.order_id) AS total_orders FROM Customer c LEFT JOIN `Order` o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id GROUP BY c.full_name, c.address ORDER BY total_orders DESC;

SELECT e.full_name AS employee_name, SUM(o.order_total) AS total_sales FROM Employee e JOIN `Order` o ON e.employee_id = o.customer_id WHERE e.salary > 60000 GROUP BY e.full_name HAVING total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, encrypted_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, encrypted_price FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, encrypted_ssn FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 2;
SELECT supplier_name, encrypted_contact_info FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, encrypted_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE encrypted_price > 100.00 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, encrypted_contact_info FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT employee_name, encrypted_salary FROM employees WHERE encrypted_ssn LIKE '5%';
